data.text: Va muenda minlangu minneni mi Babiloni ;
Kuna tudengidika zingitala zieto mu minti.
Bila kuna, batu bobo batukanga mu kivika
A buevi tulenda yimbidila minkunga mi Yave
Bika ludimi luama lunama mu mianzi mi munu ama
Tebuka moyo, a Yave, momo basi Edomi
A muana ndumba wu Babiloni, ngeyo wukubuku mu bungu ;
Khini kuidi mutu wumbuila bana baku batsombi
